snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include musings on the Steve Jobs action figure (retail: $200), fine art as emoticons on Twitter and security weaknesses...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include musings on the Steve Jobs action figure (retail: $200), fine art as emoticons on Twitter and security weaknesses in the Emergency Alert System as illustrated by fake zombie attack messages.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Vine Artists and Digital 2013
